name: Dark Black Vengeance (Prototype Tester)
description:
Dark Black Vengeance is a Third-person shooter game dedicating on the unique PS1 graphic of the 1990s.

Seeking revenge, Leonard Black kills his way through the city of Northsphere just to gain information about who slaughtered his family. Moreover, when blood is to be spilled, there's a price to be paid.

NOTE! 

This game has not in its final form and is far from finished so it needs to be tested. any feedback and advice will be greatly appreciated.
